name: Rastronaut
description:
A short game about an astronaut trapped on a collapsing spaceship. The security system is malfunctioning and actively trying to kill you. Dodge bullets in zero gravity and shoot your way to the escape pods.

Controls:

  • Arrows to aim
  • C to shoot & move around using recoil
  • X to inspect (green terminals)

In-game font: monogram by @datagoblin
Color palette: Lospec500
